job_tasks.phrase: Automating Salesforce and CPQ Configurations: Develop AI-driven solutions to streamline customizations and minimize manual tasks
job_tasks.justification: The phrase describes the goal of using AI to improve business processes (automating configurations, streamlining customizations, minimizing manual tasks) within a specific business context (Salesforce and CPQ).

job_tasks.phrase: CPQ Optimization: Configure and automate CPQ workflows to improve quoting accuracy and speed
job_tasks.justification: This phrase focuses on improving business efficiency and accuracy within a specific workflow (CPQ) using automation.

job_tasks.phrase: CI/CD Pipeline Management: Implement and maintain automated deployment processes for Salesforce updates
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the implementation and maintenance of automated deployment processes, which is a core software development/operations task.

job_tasks.phrase: By leading the delivery of end-to-end business solutions, you will ensure all systems are aligned with performance, security, and scalability requirements
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the end-to-end delivery of solutions and ensuring system requirements like performance, security, and scalability, which are typical software development responsibilities.

soft_skills.phrase: Develop AI-driven solutions to streamline customizations and minimize manual tasks
Configure and automate CPQ workflows to improve quoting accuracy and speed
Implement and maintain automated deployment processes for Salesforce updates
By leading the delivery of end-to-end business solutions, you will ensure all systems are aligned with performance, security, and scalability requirements

classification.rationale: The job description heavily focuses on automating business processes within Salesforce and CPQ using AI, but lacks specific details about core AI/ML model development or GenAI techniques. It emphasizes business integration and process optimization over the creation of advanced AI models.
